item.title: The minimalist blog post
item.description: This blog post is just a p HTML tag to show, you can do whatever you want. All you need is a h1 for the tile and a p for the text.

item.title: How it works? - This is an example blog post!
item.description: To make blog posts like this, you need to create a folder named as a date (not you gf but year-month-day or smtg like that) in the posts (by default) folder. You can put as many html files in it as you like.
